Got recommended this game by a friend in September of 2016, started playing it and got instantly hooked. Many fond memories of this game from 2016-2018, though it has changed a lot I still love this game fully.

dont ever buy, or play it, you will get sucked into it and, only 2 years later, you and your friends will only play csgo all together because you cant chose an other game that everyone has, or wants to play, so everyone will cry around for the first 50 minutes of the ranked match, that you will lose, because noone wants to actualy play this game, and it was just the least resistance on that
Fun game to play with friends

It is a fun, good intense game with a good aspect of friendliness and respect.

Got this game a long time ago. Still my main go-to game on Steam. They've really tried to keep up with other games and improved a lot over the years. Playing competitive with strangers online is still a fun experience (as long as everyone has mics).
